info.description: Test client for testing generated clients
info.title: Test Client

parameters.description: The account id to get the reports.
parameters.name: accountId

parameters.description: The end time of the report in ISO 8601 timestamp format using UTC.
parameters.name: endDateTime

parameters.description: The start time of the report in ISO 8601 timestamp format using UTC.
parameters.name: startDateTime

parameters.description: Maximum number of entries returned on one result page. If not set, the default is 100. Optional.
parameters.name: maxResults

parameters.description: A continuation token, used to page through performance reports. To retrieve the next page, set this parameter to the value of "nextPageToken" from the previous response. Optional.
parameters.name: pageToken

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's list of performance metrics.

PerformanceReport.description: The configuration data for an Ad Exchange performance report list.

calloutStatusRate.description: Rate of various prefiltering statuses per match. Please refer to the callout-status-codes.txt file for different statuses.

PerformanceReportList.description: The configuration data for an Ad Exchange performance report list.

performanceReport.description: A list of performance reports relevant for the account.

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/adexchan: Manage your Ad Exchange buyer account configuration
